title: Ctrl-F to finds in the text field
body: What is the best way to put in a feature request to the IE/Edge team?  Chrome has a great feature in that if you do a "Ctrl-F" to search, and you start to type a term, Chrome will find instances of that search term in the text fields of a form.  Firefox does this as well.  Unfortunately, both IE & Edge do not provide this feature.  IE/Edge will only search in the text that is on a page, not text that is in a value attribute of a text field.
